testcase.name: Login with a valid credential
testcase.system-out: Given I navigate to Cura System homepage....................................passed When I click Make Appointment button........................................passed And I enter a valid credential of John Doe..................................passed And I click Log in button...................................................passed Then I should be able to login successfully.................................passed

testcase.name: Login with an invalid credential
testcase.system-out: Given I navigate to Cura System homepage....................................passed When I click Make Appointment button........................................passed And I enter an invalid credential of FakeName...............................passed And I click Log in button...................................................passed Then I should NOT be able to login successfully.............................passed
